original: dbul ba zhes bya ba ni nor med pa rnams so //
analyzed: dbul ba zhes bya ba ni nor med pa rnams so //
translated: Poverty means those who have no wealth.

original: mi zad ces bya ba nor gang gis phrogs kyang zad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mi zad ces bya ba nor gang gis phrogs kyang zad pa med pa'o //
translated: Unspoiled means wealth that is not exhausted even if taken away.

original: yo byad mkho dgu sna tshogs su zhes pa ni mal cha dang / stan dang / gnas dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / byug ba la sogs pa gang dang gang sems can rnams 'dod pa de dang de'i yo byad de nye bar mkho ba'i bye brag gi rnam par ro //
analyzed: yo byad mkho dgu sna tshogs su zhes pa ni mal cha dang / stan dang / gnas dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / byug ba la sogs pa gang dang gang sems can rnams 'dod pa de dang de'i yo byad de nye bar mkho ba'i bye brag gi rnam par ro //
translated: Various necessities means that whatever is desired by sentient beings, such as bedding, seats, dwellings, clothing, ornaments, ointments, etc., that is the necessity, the particular aspect of what is needed.

original: bdag nyid nye bar gnas gyur cig ste so sor nye bar gnas par gyur cig pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid nye bar gnas gyur cig ste so sor nye bar gnas par gyur cig pa'o //
translated: May I myself be present for them, that is, may I be present for each of them.

original: sems can dbul po de rnams kyi mdun du ni sngon du'o //
analyzed: sems can dbul po de rnams kyi mdun du ni sngon du'o //
translated: In the presence of those poor sentient beings, that is, in their presence.

original: yongs su bsngo ba na 'di yang 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo las rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba na 'di yang 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo las rgya cher bstan te /
translated: And when dedicating, this is also taught extensively in the noble Diamond Victory Banner Sutra.

original: de las 'di skad du /
analyzed: de las 'di skad du /
translated: It says there:

original: des dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba na 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /üîΩdge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur cig / nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad skyob par gyur cig /
analyzed: des dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba na 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur cig / nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad skyob par gyur cig /
translated: When they dedicate those roots of virtue, they dedicate them like this:üîΩBy these roots of virtue, for the sake of averting the entire mass of suffering, may I become an abode for all sentient beings.üîΩFor the sake of liberating all sentient beings from all afflictions, may I become a protector for all sentient beings.

original: 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur cig /
translated: For the sake of protecting all sentient beings from all fears, may I become a refuge for all sentient beings.

original: sa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur cig shin tu grub pa dang bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen du gyur cig /üîΩrab rib med pa'i ye shes kun tu bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur cig shin tu grub pa dang bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen du gyur cig / rab rib med pa'i ye shes kun tu bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: May I become the protector of all sentient beings, in order to attain the highest perfection and happiness.

original: sems can thams cad kyi snang bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi snang bar gyur cig /
translated: May I become the light of all sentient beings, in order to reveal the wisdom that is free of the darkness of ignorance.üîΩMay I become the lamp of all sentient beings, in order to dispel the darkness of ignorance.

original: ma rig pa'i mun pa bzlog pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi sgron mar gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher 'byung ste /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i mun pa bzlog pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi sgron mar gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher 'byung ste /
translated: And so on at great length.

original: de ltar bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bstan nas /
translated: Having taught in this way,

original: yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: yang 'di skad du /
translated: it continues:

original: de yang lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su bsngo'i /
analyzed: de yang lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su bsngo'i /
translated: Moreover, one should dedicate with a sincere motivation,

original: tshig tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshig tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: not just with words.

original: de yang dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de yang dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Moreover, one should dedicate with a joyful mind,

original: mgu ba'i sems kyis @71a * //üîΩyongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: mgu ba'i sems kyis @71a * // yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: with a contented mind,

original: rab tu dad pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: rab tu dad pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: with a mind of deep faith.

original: rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind of utmost joy.

original: mnyan pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: mnyan pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind of listening.

original: byams pa'i sems dang / mnga' ba'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o zhes rgya cher gsungs so //
analyzed: byams pa'i sems dang / mnga' ba'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o zhes rgya cher gsungs so //
translated: I dedicate with a mind of love, a mind of respect, a mind of benefit.

original: da ni lus la sogs pa yongs su gtong bar byed pa /
analyzed: da ni lus la sogs pa yongs su gtong bar byed pa /
translated: Now, in order to give away the body and so forth, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares,

original: lus dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lus dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe body, and so forth,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / bya ba thams cad la ltos pa med par te /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / bya ba thams cad la ltos pa med par te /
translated: In all migrations, without regard for death, rebirth, and all activities,

original: rnam pa thams cad du chags pa med par zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du chags pa med par zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that [one should give] without attachment in every way.

original: gtang bar bya zhes pa ni dbul bar bya ba ste sbyin par bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gtang bar bya zhes pa ni dbul bar bya ba ste sbyin par bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúShould be given‚Äù means ‚Äúshould be offered,‚Äù which is to say, ‚Äúshould be given.‚Äù

original: longs spyod ces bya ba ni nye bar spyad par bya ba'i dngos po rnams te /
analyzed: longs spyod ces bya ba ni nye bar spyad par bya ba'i dngos po rnams te /
translated: ‚ÄúEnjoyment‚Äù are things that are to be used.

original: rta dang glang po che dang / shing rta dang / khang bzangs la sogs pa'i gnas dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / tsandan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / bu mo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rta dang glang po che dang / shing rta dang / khang bzangs la sogs pa'i gnas dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / tsandan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / bu mo la sogs pa'o //
translated: the abode of horses, elephants, chariots, and palaces, garlands of flowers, sandalwood, clothing, ornaments, and daughters.

original: dus gsum dge ba thams cad kyang zhes bya ba ni khams gsum par bsdus pa'i bsod nams dang / mi g-yo ba'i rang bzhin thams cad do //
analyzed: dus gsum dge ba thams cad kyang zhes bya ba ni khams gsum par bsdus pa'i bsod nams dang / mi g-yo ba'i rang bzhin thams cad do //
translated: All virtues of the three times means all merits and immovables subsumed in the three realms.

original: yang na sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba ste dus gsum du gtogs pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'o //
analyzed: yang na sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba ste dus gsum du gtogs pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'o //
translated: Alternatively, generosity, morality, and so on, and those arisen from meditation, belonging to the three times, are past, future, and present.

original: 'o na ma 'ongs pa'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa 'di ji ltar gtang du rung zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ma 'ongs pa'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa 'di ji ltar gtang du rung zhe na /
translated: But if the future does not exist, how can it be relinquished?

original: bden mod kyi 'on kyang de yod pa'i dus su de la zhen pa bzlog pa'i don du de skad du brjod pa dang / da lta na yang de yongs su btang bas bsam pa rnam par dag pa 'phel bar bya ba'i don du yang yin no //
analyzed: bden mod kyi 'on kyang de yod pa'i dus su de la zhen pa bzlog pa'i don du de skad du brjod pa dang / da lta na yang de yongs su btang bas bsam pa rnam par dag pa 'phel bar bya ba'i don du yang yin no //
translated: True, but it is said in order to turn away attachment to it when it exists, and also in order to increase the pure thought by giving it up now.

original: de nyid ni ltos pa med pa zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni ltos pa med pa zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: That is called ‚Äúwithout regard.‚Äù

original: de'i rnam par smin pa la rang gi don du ltos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam par smin pa la rang gi don du ltos pa med pa'o //
translated: It is without regard for its own result.

original: de ltar na su'i don du nyams su len par byed ce na /
analyzed: de ltar na su'i don du nyams su len par byed ce na /
translated: For whose sake does one practice?

original: sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir // zhes gsungs te /
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the aim of all sentient beings.

original: sems can kun te khams gsum par gnas pa rnams kyis mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //üîΩ'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dge @71b ba'i rtsa ba btang ba ni /
analyzed: sems can kun te khams gsum par gnas pa rnams kyis mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro // 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dge @71b ba'i rtsa ba btang ba ni /
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the aim of all sentient beings, which is characterized by high rebirth and the auspicious, in the three realms.

original: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las bstan pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las bstan pa /
translated: Giving up the roots of virtue of the past and future is taught in the noble Aksayamatinirdesa:

original: dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rjes su dran la rjes su dran nas kyang byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni 'das pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rjes su dran la rjes su dran nas kyang byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni 'das pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: One recalls virtuous minds and mental factors, and having recalled them, one dedicates them to enlightenment. This is skill with regard to the past.

original: gang ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nges par sems shing byang chub la mngon du phyogs pa'i las sems pa ste /
analyzed: gang ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nges par sems shing byang chub la mngon du phyogs pa'i las sems pa ste /
translated: One definitely thinks about the roots of virtue in the future and thinks about the karma that is directed toward enlightenment.üîΩWhatever virtuous minds arise in me, I dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment. This is skill with regard to the future.

original: bdag la dge ba'i sems bskyed pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa'o zhes rgya cher gsungs pa dang / thams cad gtong ba la mos pa yongs su rdzogs te /
analyzed: bdag la dge ba'i sems bskyed pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa'o zhes rgya cher gsungs pa dang / thams cad gtong ba la mos pa yongs su rdzogs te /
translated: One is completely dedicated to the aspiration to give everything away.

original: gtong ba'i sems kyi shugs kyis lus kyi sbyor ba des yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad gtong ste /
analyzed: gtong ba'i sems kyi shugs kyis lus kyi sbyor ba des yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad gtong ste /
translated: Through the force of the mind of giving, one gives away all possessions through the application of the body.

original: yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba srid pa'i sdug bsngal las grol ba la grol ba zhes rgya cher gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba srid pa'i sdug bsngal las grol ba la grol ba zhes rgya cher gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: That is the liberation which is taught extensively as ‚Äúliberation from the suffering of existence, the root of all grasping.‚Äù

original: 'o na bdag gi don du yang cung zad bsrung bar rigs pa ma yin nam snyam pa'i ser sna zlog par byed pa /
analyzed: 'o na bdag gi don du yang cung zad bsrung bar rigs pa ma yin nam snyam pa'i ser sna zlog par byed pa /
translated: Now, in order to avert the miserliness which thinks, ‚ÄúIt is not right to give even a little for my own sake,‚Äù he says,

original: thams cad btang bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad btang bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúI will give everything away,‚Äù and so on.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i lus la sogs pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni thar pa yin la /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i lus la sogs pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni thar pa yin la /
translated: Nirvana is the liberation of all the contaminated body, etc.

original: bdag gi sems pa ni de don du gnyer ba yin te /
analyzed: bdag gi sems pa ni de don du gnyer ba yin te /
translated: My mind is intent on that.

original: gtang bya na zhes bya ba ni gal te mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe lus la sogs pa thams cad bdag gis nges par btang la 'gro bar bya ba yin pa de'i tshe sems can rnams la btang ba mchog yin na /
analyzed: gtang bya na zhes bya ba ni gal te mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe lus la sogs pa thams cad bdag gis nges par btang la 'gro bar bya ba yin pa de'i tshe sems can rnams la btang ba mchog yin na /
translated: If, when I go to nirvana, I must definitely give up all the body, etc., and go, then it is best to give them to sentient beings.

original: ser sna'i rgyu 'dis bzung la ci zhig bya snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: ser sna'i rgyu 'dis bzung la ci zhig bya snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: What will I do with this cause of miserliness?

original: de lta bas na 'di dag la 'di 'tsham pa yin no zhes /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di dag la 'di 'tsham pa yin no zhes /
translated: Therefore, it is fitting for me to do this for them.

original: bdag gis lus can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bdag gis lus can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus he says, ‚ÄúI will give my body to all embodied beings,‚Äù and so on.

original: lus can thams cad de /
analyzed: lus can thams cad de /
translated: All embodied beings meansüîΩall sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi ched du ji ltar 'dod pa dang mthun par bya ba la bdag gis rang gi lus sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi ched du ji ltar 'dod pa dang mthun par bya ba la bdag gis rang gi lus sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: For their sake, I will give my body to them, in whatever way they desire.

original: de nyid ston par byed pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid ston par byed pa ni /
translated: He teaches just that

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /üîΩdbyig pa la sogs pas rdeg par byed pa'am /üîΩbsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas smad du chug la /
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te / dbyig pa la sogs pas rdeg par byed pa'am / bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas smad du chug la /
translated: with ‚ÄúI will always be their servant,‚Äù and so on.üîΩLet them beat me with sticks and so on,üîΩor revile me with verbal abuse.

original: lud kyis kyang gtor du chug ste /
analyzed: lud kyis kyang gtor du chug ste /
translated: Let them throw filth on me,

original: rdul gyis kyang 'thor cig pa'o //üîΩbdag @72a * //üîΩgis de la lus byin gyis //
analyzed: rdul gyis kyang 'thor cig pa'o // bdag @72a * // gis de la lus byin gyis //
translated: or cover me with dust.üîΩI will give my body to them.

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi thams cad du bdag gis de rnams la yongs su btang ba yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi thams cad du bdag gis de rnams la yongs su btang ba yin la /
translated: I will give them my body completely and totally.

original: bdag la bde ba dang sdug bsngal bas kha das ci zhig bya /
analyzed: bdag la bde ba dang sdug bsngal bas kha das ci zhig bya /
translated: What use is happiness or suffering to me?

original: las rnams kyang ni byed du chug / ces bya ba ni kha na mtho ba med pa dag ste /
analyzed: las rnams kyang ni byed du chug / ces bya ba ni kha na mtho ba med pa dag ste /
translated: And let them do their actions means without any wrongdoing.

original: de nyid ni bdag la zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩbdag la brten nas nam du yang ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni bdag la zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te / bdag la brten nas nam du yang ste /
translated: That very thing is stated in May they never have any desire for me, and so on.üîΩMay they never have any desire for me, means in any way, at any time, in this world or the next.

original: 'di 'am pha rol du srog chags 'ga' la yang mi 'dod par ma gyur cig ces pa'o //üîΩgang dag gi khro ba 'am gang dag gi ma dad pa'i sems te /üîΩblo byung ba de dag gi ni ste /
analyzed: 'di 'am pha rol du srog chags 'ga' la yang mi 'dod par ma gyur cig ces pa'o // gang dag gi khro ba 'am gang dag gi ma dad pa'i sems te / blo byung ba de dag gi ni ste /
translated: May they never have any desire for me means may they never have any desire for me.üîΩWhatever anger or lack of faith arises in them, means whatever anger or lack of faith arises in their minds.

original: khro ba 'am ma dad pa'i blo can rnams kyi'o //üîΩde nyid ni rgyur gyur cig te /
analyzed: khro ba 'am ma dad pa'i blo can rnams kyi'o // de nyid ni rgyur gyur cig te /
translated: Whatever anger or lack of faith arises in their minds, means in the minds of those who are angry or lack faith.üîΩMay that very thing become the cause, means may that very anger or lack of faith become the cause.

original: khro ba'am ma dad pa'i sems de nyid do //
analyzed: khro ba'am ma dad pa'i sems de nyid do //
translated: May that very anger or lack of faith become the cause, means may that very anger or lack of faith become the cause.

original: don kun 'grub pa'i zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par legs par rdzogs pa'i ched du'o //
analyzed: don kun 'grub pa'i zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par legs par rdzogs pa'i ched du'o //
translated: For the accomplishment of all aims, means for the sake of accomplishing one's own and others' aims, in terms of the perfection of high status and the perfection of the definitive good.

original: skur 'debs pa zhes bya ba ni log par brtags pa'i nyes pas sun 'byin par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan du yang gang dag lus sam yid kyis gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba'o //üîΩkha zer ba zhes bya ba ni bshad gang du byed pa'am /
analyzed: skur 'debs pa zhes bya ba ni log par brtags pa'i nyes pas sun 'byin par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan du yang gang dag lus sam yid kyis gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba'o // kha zer ba zhes bya ba ni bshad gang du byed pa'am /
translated: The denigrators are those who, through the fault of false imagination, are to be refuted, and also those who do harm with body or mind.

original: co 'dri bar byed pa'o //üîΩde bzhin gzhan zhes bya ba ni tha mal pa tsam mam /
analyzed: co 'dri bar byed pa'o // de bzhin gzhan zhes bya ba ni tha mal pa tsam mam /
translated: The slanderers are those who speak of others' faults.üîΩThe scolders are those who speak of others' faults.

original: dad pa rnams te /
analyzed: dad pa rnams te /
translated: The others are those who are indifferent, or have faith.

original: thams cad sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur cig pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur cig pa'o //
translated: The all are those who are to attain Buddhahood.

original: mgon med rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni mgon dang bcas par 'dod pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: mgon med rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni mgon dang bcas par 'dod pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The helpless are those who desire to have a protector.

original: lam zhugs rnams kyi ded dpon dang // zhes bya ba ni lam du nye bar zhugs pa rnams kyi ded dpon gyi gtso bor ro //
analyzed: lam zhugs rnams kyi ded dpon dang // zhes bya ba ni lam du nye bar zhugs pa rnams kyi ded dpon gyi gtso bor ro //
translated: The leaders are the chief guides of those who have entered the path.

original: rgal 'dod rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni 'bab chu la sogs pa rnams kyi pha rol gyi 'gram du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: rgal 'dod rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni 'bab chu la sogs pa rnams kyi pha rol gyi 'gram du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The those who desire to cross over are those who desire to go to the further shore of rivers, etc.

original: sgron ma zhes bya ba ni mun pa na gnas pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sgron ma zhes bya ba ni mun pa na gnas pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The lamp is for those who are in the dark.

original: gnas mal 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni mal cha 'dod pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: gnas mal 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni mal cha 'dod pa rnams la'o //
translated: The bed is for those who want a bed.

original: bran 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni gang dag rim gro'i don du bran dang las byed pa 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: bran 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni gang dag rim gro'i don du bran dang las byed pa 'dod pa'o //
